name: Bring Light
description:
Simple and ralaxing game, enjoy the music while you try to get as far as you can into the cave. Your the only light left.

How far deep into the cave can you bring light to restore life?

Made with Godot. Blur does not work on web, don't know why... 

¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Cave asset from Maaot: 2D DarkCave Assets by Maaot (itch.io)

Musics from robotmeadows: Ambient Synths by robotmeadows (itch.io)
